price: Odazvat će se jedino oni koji slušaju. A Allah će umrle oživiti; zatim će se Njemu svi vratiti.
arabic: ۞ إِنَّمَا يَسۡتَجِيبُ ٱلَّذِينَ يَسۡمَعُونَۘ وَٱلۡمَوۡتَىٰ يَبۡعَثُهُمُ ٱللَّهُ ثُمَّ إِلَيۡهِ يُرۡجَعُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: innamā yastajību alladhīna yasmaʿūna wal-mawtā yabʿathuhumu al-lahu thumma ilayhi yur'jaʿūna
